    • Constructor Detail

      • MergePlan

        public MergePlan(java.util.List<java.lang.Integer> combinationOrder,
         boolean retainColumns,
         java.lang.String separator)
        Merge plan specifying how the marge will happen
        Parameters:
        combinationOrder - A list of integers which will be merged together in the given order
        retainColumns - False when you want to remove the original columns specified in @combinationOrder
        separator - A separator that will be added between each column values
